QuestData.Title: High Priestess Jeklik
QuestData.Description: Ahead of you looms a ramp up to one of the city's many terraces. The bat-shaped totems ahead of you indicate that this is the domain of High Priestess Jeklik, a follower of Hir'eek.$b$bJeklik was one of the Hakkar-worshipping priests that Zanzil was planning to resurrect. Perhaps if you hurry, you can stop the resurrection!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Follower of Hir'eek, the bat loa.
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy High Priestess Jeklik's body before Zanzil can resurrect her.$b$bIf you become lost or need to return to Zul'Gurub, speak with Maywiki at the Explorers' League Digsite.
QuestData.RewardText: You have succeeded in preventing Zanzil from resurrecting High Priestess Jeklik. Without one of his priests, Jin'do will certainly have a difficult time summoning Hakkar.
